attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government correctly wants the use of plastic bags reduced.  Can the Government look at the use of Plastic Bags used by newspapers being sold in Supermarkets, as this is an unwanted use of plastic bags. Supermarkets are themeselves trying to reduce the use of plastic bags, and this is an extension of this policy

rejection.details: Please make your title a clear call for action.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
